definition: Luo Ronghuan (1902-1963), Chinese communist military leader
gauze/to collect/to gather/to catch/to sift

surname Rong
glory/honor/thriving

sentences.english: At that time, the Secretariat of the Central Committee discussed Comrade Luo Ronghuan's views and concurred with them.
sentences.chinese: 当时书记处讨论，赞成罗荣桓同志的这个意见。

definition: Peng Dehuai (1898-1974), top communist general, subsequently politician and politburo member, disgraced after attacking Mao's failed policies in 1959, and died after extensive persecution during the Cultural Revolution

He Long (1896-1969), important communist military leader, died from persecution during the Cultural Revolution
Li Xiannian (1909-1992), PRC general and politician
Yang Shangkun (1907-1998), former president of PRC and military leader
Liu Shaoqi (1898-1969), Chinese communist leader, a martyr of the Cultural Revolution
Song Renqiong (1909-2005), general of the People's Liberation Army
Mao Zedong (1893-1976), Chinese communist leader
Zhou Enlai (1898-1976), Chinese communist leader, prime minister 1949-1976
Chen Zaidao (1909-1993), general in the People's Liberation Army
